feature.name: User
feature.description: User details management - Manage details about user

operations.description: Retrieves details of user whose credentials were passed in request

feature.name: Movie
feature.description: Movie details management - Manage movie and genre details

operations.description: Retrieves details of user whose credentials were passed in request

uriParams.name: movieId
uriParams.description: Pass a comma-limited list of values. Each of those values must be contained by name of at least one genre of movie. So for "com,ram" com is contained in Comedy and ram is contained in Drama.

queryParams.name: genres
queryParams.description: Pass a comma-limited list of values. Each of those values must be contained by name of at least one genre of movie. So for "com,ram" com is contained in Comedy and ram is contained in Drama.

operations.description: Retrieves details of user whose credentials were passed in request

feature.name: Error
feature.description: Error details management - Manage server and client error details
